original_title: Insane Clown Posse: Bootlegged in L.A.
overview: Insane Clown Posse fans are sure to enjoy this outrageously awesome concert recorded live in Las Vegas Hemp Festival. Violent J and Shaggy 2 Dope rock the house with such hit songs. Always looking to start some trouble and incite mayhem, these Detroit-born, out-of-control performers get their army of loyal fans pumped up by spraying them with Faygo.
title: Insane Clown Posse: Bootlegged in L.A.
